name: smart-restaurant
description: Vietnamese Restaurant Management System using ABP Framework

scripts.generate-proxy: cd angular && abp generate-proxy -t ng -u https://localhost:44346
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mobile
scripts.build:backend: cd aspnet-core && dotnet publish src/SmartRestaurant.HttpApi.Host -c Release
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:mobile
scripts.clean:frontend: cd angular && rm -rf node_modules dist .angular && npm install
scripts.clean:mobile: cd flutter_mobile && flutter clean && flutter pub get

author: SmartRestaurant Team
